name: One Night at Williams 3 Custom Night
name_original: One Night at Williams 3 Custom Night
description:
Note: The Original creator who made this got deleted, don't know how but It did so now I own this game now I guess?

How to play

William:

William will always be in the left hallway, keep checking the left hallway on your monitor and if William gets closer to the camera, shut the left door until he moves away from the camera.

Cherry:

When you hear music start playing, open up your camera and check the left and right hallway. When the music gets loud shut the door on the side cherry was on and wait for her to leave

Wyatt:

Wyatt will always stay in your vent. listen for vents sounds which means he gets close. when you hear the vent sounds go to the vent camera and press the lock vent button

Matthew:

Matthew will stay in cam 2 behind the curtains. When you cannot see him any longer on that camera, shut the right door until he goes back.

Harry:

Sometimes when putting your monitor down Harry will be standing in the office. If this happens put your monitor back up before he jumpscares you

Ennard:

Listen carefully for a clinking-like sound. Once you hear it check both hallways on your monitor then shut the door Ennard is on until he goes away

Jake:

Jake will sometimes go into cam 1 and try draining your oxygen if he tries draining it click the controlled shock button

Michael:

Michael will either hide in the left or right closet. when he says he will give you a surprise shut the door on the side he was on then he will bang on the door then run to the other closet

Steve:

Steve will sometimes show up at one of your doors in your office. If you see him at one of the doors shut the door on the side he was on

until you hear footsteps meaning he goes away

William 2.0:

William 2.0 will sometimes appear in your office so if he does make sure you click on him to make him go away

#horror #fangame #fnaf
